short_summary: The Canadian government is seeking proposals for the supply and delivery of 1200 C-8 Carbine Suppressors.
description: The process involves the provision of technical specification and documentation to ensure that the selected contractor meets the requirements of the contract. The selected contractor will deliver the supreme values of company reputation, cost, and technical capability, beginning in 2024. Final payments will be processed after delivery.
duration_in_months: , Urgent action is required to ensure a timely supply of suppressors.
tags: Technical Assistance and/or Acquisition of Goods and Services
full_summary:
=====================================

**Government Tender Announcement: C-8 Carbine Suppressors**

**Requisition Summary:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a supplier for the delivery of C-8 Carbine Suppressors. The procurement involves the supply of 1,200 units, with the option to purchase additional quantities over a period of up to 60 months from the contract award date.

**Technical Specifications:**
The requested equipment must comply with the Technical Specifications outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) solicitation document.

**Submissions:**
Suppliers are required to submit their bids before the closing date of 14 March 2024 @ 14:00 HAE.

**Important Information:**

* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
* The procurement process is competitive, with open bidding.
* The selection criteria are based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact Megan Buchanan at:
Megan.Buchanan@forces.gc.ca
(613) 945-2929

**Attachments:**
The following documents are available for download:
* English version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21009/w6399_22lj37_a_rfp_amdt001_english.pdf
* French version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21009/w6399_22lj37_a_rfp_amdt002_french.pdf

**Notice Fields:**
+ **Procurement Reference:** W6399-22LJ37/A
+ **Publication Date:** 29 September 2023
+ **Tender Closing Date:** 14 March 2024 @ 14:00 HAE
+ **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
+ **Procurement Method:** Competitive Open Bidding
+ **Procurement Status:** Expired
+ **Region of Opportunity:** Worldwide
+ **Region of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR) - Canada
*   **isation of Delivery:** Contractors are responsible for the delivery of the C-8 Carbine Suppressors to the government within the specified timeframe.

Note to the reader: Ensure you submit your bid according to the specifications and before the closing date to avoid being disqualified from the procurement process. RoutingCharacterSetue327Machine IndustriesこのPolyphem recursiveDirector191
